    public interface JsonFormatVisitable
    Interface JsonSerializer implements to allow for visiting type hierarchy.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void acceptJsonFormatVisitor(JsonFormatVisitorWrapper visitor, JavaType typeHint)
      Get the representation of the schema to which this serializer will conform.

    • 方法详细资料

      • acceptJsonFormatVisitor

        void acceptJsonFormatVisitor(JsonFormatVisitorWrapper visitor,
                             JavaType typeHint)
                      throws JsonMappingException
        Get the representation of the schema to which this serializer will conform.
        参数:
        typeHint - Type of element (entity like property) being visited
        抛出:
        JsonMappingException
